name: Drain Life
description: Each blow you make, each wound you inflict, each drop of blood you draw breathes you with power and appeasement.
effect: Each time your hero slays an adversary with a Combat weapon action, you can remove one wound marker from their hero card.
additionalEffect: you can roll a D6 before removing a wound marker - on the roll of 6 you can remove a grievously injury marker instead.
